definitions.definition: To strike or hit with something hard, usually on the head ; to club .
examples: The apprehended rioter was bludgeoned to death.

definitions.definition: To coerce someone, as if with a bludgeon.
examples: Their favorite method was bludgeoning us with the same old arguments in favor of their opinions.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To strike or hit with something hard, usually on the head ; to club .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To coerce someone, as if with a bludgeon.
